name: Connect The Bots
description:
Find the feature that both the robots share (could be eyes, ears, mouth, colour and sometimes none) but be careful because you're up against the clock!

How many points will you score?

How to play:

You have 30 seconds to Find the common feature between both the robots (eyes, ears, mouth, colour or none) and click the corresponding button, if there is more than 1 common feature you only have to click 1 button, if you get it right you will gain an extra 2.5 seconds and 5 points. If you get it wrong then you lose 5 seconds from your time.  A new pair will then appear, this will repeat until your time runs out.

Good luck and how many points will you score?  (tell us in the comments)
